name: Falkenbach
description: '''Falkenbach''' ({{IPA|de|ˈfalkənbax|lang}}, {{lit}} "Falconbrook") is a German [[viking metal|viking]]/[[pagan metal]] project. The one permanent member is Vratyas Vakyas (real name Markus Tümmers) who was born in Germany, but lived in Iceland in the late 1980s. Falkenbach is one of the first viking metal bands, starting in 1989, with its first release that same year.
